attributes.action: Take the Royal Family out of Taxation System
attributes.additional_details:
Her Majesty The Queen, and all members of the Royal Family are now required to pay Income Tax to Her Government wrongly.

The Royal Family should be independent of the government and seeing as they are the Royal Family have huge hereditary responsibilities, work excellently for our country and not able to form a life outside of the cameras, why on Earth should they pay a penny in tax?

Her Majesty and Their Royal Highnesses should not pay any tax and should be taken out of the taxation system.
